body.p: The Delete I/O Completion Queue command is used to delete a completion queue previously created with the Create I/O Completion Queue command. Software shall ensure that any associated I/O Submission Queue is deleted prior to deleting a Completion Queue.

fig.title: Delete I/O Completion Queue Command Control Flow

table.title: Delete I/O Completion Queue Command Control Flow

entry.p: The command is received by one of the Data Managers.
The Data Manager forwards the command to the Admin Command Manager for processing.

If there are no longer any submission queues that reference this completion queue, the Admin Command Manager disables the completion queue engine and updates its internal state to reflect that the completion queue has been deleted.
The Admin Command Manager sends a completion queue update request to the Completion Manager.
The Completion Manager replies back to the Admin Command Manager when the completion has been successfully sent to the host.
